channel.title: Cammy pvp server
channel.description:
Hey all just quickly, Im going to be making another version of phatz pvp just wondering on peoples thoughts of making an old school server or if anyone has any ideas
Im going to buy vps very soon..
thanks.

item.title: Cammy pvp server
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

2006 servers has been somewhat of an old party trick. Jagex ruined the trick when they opened up their own remake, so basically no one is going to play unless what you have to offer is so insanely different and well structured that it makes a vanilla 2006 server unappealing. Higher revisions may do better, but there needs to be balance. Forcing players to do purely PvP for rewards will cut out half of the community and honestly I can’t say I have ever seen a pure pvp server last long at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Cammy pvp server
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

thakillah:

wrong section damn i’m tired of saying this

If you’re tired of saying it then just move on. Don’t say anything, it’s easier.

On topic: I think people are generally tired of the 2006’ish servers (from what I could gather from the reactions of several people in response to other servers). I think if your server is half decent with a good structure and becomes popular, it’ll be worth it, otherwise I’d aim at a higher revision. I think the 474 revision is quite good (clan chat, etc) personally, so maybe look into that.

I guess it’s down to personal opinion and general popularity.

Read full topic
